level.heading: Limits on funding Individual Training Accounts.

level.text: Beginning January 1, 2005, no entity providing training services will be eligible to receive funding for more than 5 Individual Training Accounts in a calendar year unless at least 25% of the students participating in the entity's training programs are paying commercially established tuition funded by sources other than the District government.

Beginning January 1, 2006, no entity providing training services will be eligible to receive funding for more than 5 Individual Training Accounts in a calendar year unless at least 50% of the students participating in the entity's training programs are paying commercially established tuition funded by sources other than the District government.
An entity providing training services shall certify to the Mayor on July 1st and January 2nd of each year:
The total number of students enrolled in the entity's training programs;
The number of students who are funded by sources other than the District government; and
The percentage calculated using the number in paragraph (1) of this subsection as the denominator and the number in paragraph (2) of this subsection as the numerator.
